message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I believe I can offer you $95 for the product, which I think is a fair price considering its value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110 for the product. It's a great value, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to propose $100 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise given the value I place on it.
